caption.p: (a) Leaf nitrogen content of Podophyllum peltatum was greater in the presence of invasive Lumbricus terrestris earthworms ( F 1,1 = 4.16, P = 0.05) in a pot experiment. (b) Internal leaf CO 2 concentration (C i) of Podophyllum peltatum was reduced when earthworms were present ( Table 3). Means Â± 1SE
